---
id: "SYSREQ-EDIT-001"
type: system_requirement
name: "Editable System Requirement"
description: "A requirement to test edit functionality"
specification: "The system SHALL support editing of metadata."
derives_from:
  - "SCEN-EDIT-001"
---

# System Requirement: Editable System Requirement

## Requirement Specification

> The system SHALL support editing of metadata.

## Rationale

Users need the ability to update document metadata after creation.
